prediction_formula: P(p|2n+1 | n prime) = 1/(p-1) for all p >= 3
mechanism: Mutual exclusivity: if p|n and p|(2n+1), then p|1, impossible for all p
note: Unlike twin primes, mutual exclusivity holds for ALL primes including p=3
z_score_definition: z = (observed - predicted) / SE, where SE = sqrt(p̂(1-p̂)/n)
z_score_note: Binomial SE is a conservative yardstick, not a faithful null distribution for deterministic enumeration
